Share Calendar
Configuration of calendar data sharing
You can share the todoyu calendar data with other applications and services.
This enables you to sync your calendar management application (on your computer or smartphone, etc.) with your event stored in todoyu.
To access the calendar data in iCal format use the following URL with the respective token appended:
To directly download the iCal file into another application or service, use the following URL with the token appended:
